da.email_exists: Der findes allerede en konto med den email, prøv venligst igen, eller gå til login.
da.forgot_password_explainer: Indtast din email for at modtage en sikkerhedskode til at nulstille dit password.
da.security_code_explainer: Vi har sendt dig en email med en sikkerhedskode, indtast den samt det password du ønsker.
da.invalid_security_code: Sikkerhedskoden skal være på seks tegn.
da.no_tasting: Vi beklager! Der er desværre ingen smagninger planlagt p.t. Check snart igen da der er nye smagninger under planlægning.
da.adr_explainer: Venligst indtast din adresse. Vi bruger din adresse til at verificere betalingsoplysning, samt, hvis nødvendige at sende pakker til.
da.payment_success_text: Tak, din betaling er successfuldt gennemført. Vi har sent en kvittering til nedenstående email.
da.create_account_explainer: Indtast din email for at modtage en sikkerhedskode til at oprette din konto.
da.no_orders_found: Du har ikke lavet nogle ordre endnu.
da.searching_winebars: Leder efter vin barer i nærheden
da.no_winebar_near: Vi beklager! Vi kunne ikke finde nogle vin barer i nærheden af dig. Prøv venligst igen senere da vi tilføjer nye vin barer hver dag.
da.no_restaurant_near: Vi beklager! Vi kunne ikke finde nogle restauranter i nærheden af dig. Prøv venligst igen senere da vi tilføjer nye restauranter hver dag.
da.no_reviews: Vi fandt ingen vin anmeldelser fra dig...
da.update_text: Der er opdateringer til fairTasting appen som kræver at du genstarter appen.
da.password_minimum_length: Din adgangskode skal være minimum otte tegn, mindst et stort bogstav, et lille bogstav, et tal og et specialtegn
da.what_is_text: Savner du det forkromede overblik over de mest interessante vinsmagninger og de restauranter, der har de skarpeste vinkort? Og vil du gerne nemt kunne købe dine billetter og vin i én og samme app? Så er FairTasting appen for dig. Her får du det samlede overblik over alt det, der rører sig i vinbranchen. Køb billetter til smagninger, download smagekataloger direkte i appen, og planlæg dit næste restaurant- eller vinbarbesøg baseret på de vine, du gerne vil drikke.

beta_test.email_verification_thanks: Tak din email er nu bekræftet - du hører snart mere fra os!
beta_test.thanks_text: Mange tak for at ville hjælpe os! Vi har sendt dig en email med et link til at bekræfte din email. Vi aktiverer beta testere efter behov og når vi ruller ud til nye lande, så hold øje med din email.
beta_test.teaser: Mange tak for din interesse i fairTasting, vi er blevet overvældet af antallet af folk som gerne ville være beta-testere, vi er derfor stoppet med at modtage ansøgninger.
beta_test.instruction: For at komme i betragtning som beta tester beder vi dig udfylde formularen herunder. Hvis du bliver udvalgt vil du modtage en email med yderligere instruktioner, hvad vi forventer af dig og hvad din belønning, for at hjælpe os, bliver.

home.subscribe_confirmed: Tak! Du er nu tilmeldt vores nyhedsbrev.
home.tagline: fairTasting - fra vin elskere til vin elskere.
home.sub_teaser: Fra vin elskere til vin elskere

landing.welcome_text_1: At smage vin kan være interessant, sjovt, inspirerende, lærerigt – OG vanskeligt, alt efter hvem man er og på hvilket smagsmæssigt niveau, man befinder sig. Med fairTasting får du et værktøj, som giver dig mulighed for at smage og opleve vin på en helt ny og meget personlig måde. Vi giver dig den direkte adgang til vinens verden fra producenten til dit glas.
landing.for_wine_lovers_text_1: fairTasting er din portal til vinens verden. Her kan du find vin barer og restauranter med vinkort som passer din smag, du kan desuden tilmelde dig vinsmagninger og messer. Samtidig har du mulighed for at holde styr på, hvad du har smagt, hvor og hvornår - og hvad du synes om vinene i form af dine smagenotater!
landing.for_wine_lovers_text_2: Med fairTasting behøver du ikke papir og pen. Du har alt på telefonen – ikke kun i dag men også næste gang, du deltager i en vinsmagning – uanset om det er næste uge eller om flere år. Du får simpelthen et værktøj til at holde styr på alle detaljer.
landing.for_wine_bars_text_1: Med fairTasting får du adgang til en verden af vin elskere. Vi giver vin elskere muligheden for at finde frem til dig, på baggrund af dine vine, således at du får flere gæster der passer til lige dit sortiment.
landing.for_wine_bars_text_2: Lav specielle oplevelser for dit klientel så som vin smagninger, wine makers dinners og wine flights.
landing.for_wine_bars_text_3: Få adgang til statistik omkring dine gæsters vinsmag, præferencer og meget mere...
landing.for_wine_shops_text_1: Hvor bliver dine vine drukket, og hvad synes folk om dem? Hvilke trends er der i markedet lige nu?
landing.for_wine_shops_text_2: Med fairTasting for du adgang til statistik om dine vine, så du bedre kan planlægge dit sortiment. Vi giver dig også let adgang til at finde nye producenter fra hele verden.
landing.for_wine_shops_text_3: Vi gør det også muligt for dig enkelt at udbrede kendskaben til dine vine, gennem smagninger og forskellige events.
landing.launching_soon_text: På mobile enheder giver vores App den bedste oplevelse, download den nu på enten App Store eller Google Play!

complete_profile.explainer: For at yde dig den bedste service har vi brug for en lille smule mere information
complete_profile.name_explainer: Fortæl os hvad du hedder, det er ikke kun høfligt, det gør din oplevelse hos os meget enklere.
complete_profile.gender_explainer: Vi ønsker at respektere alle, fortæl os venligst hvordan vi må referere til dig.
complete_profile.dob_explainer: Vi vil også gerne fejre dig, men endnu vigtigere skal vi sikre at du er myndig da du kan købe alkohol igennem appen.

en.email_exists: The email is already registered, please try again or login.
en.forgot_password_explainer: Enter your email to receive a security code for resetting your password.
en.security_code_explainer: You will receive a security code in your email shortly, please enter it together with you desired password.
en.invalid_security_code: Security code should be six characters.
en.no_tasting: We are sorry!. Currently there are no tastings planned. Check back soon as new tastings are currently being planned.
en.adr_explainer: Please enter your address. We use your address to combat fraud and, if needed, ship items to.
en.payment_success_text: Thank you! Your payment was successful, we have sent a receipt to the folowing email.
en.create_account_explainer: Enter your email to receive a security code for creating an account.
en.no_orders_found: You have not created any orders yet.
en.no_winebar_near: We are so sorry! We did not find any wine bars near you. Please check back later as we are adding new wine bars every day.
en.no_restaurant_near: We are so sorry! We did not find any restaurants near you. Please check back later as we are adding new restaurants every day.
en.waiting_for_description: We are waiting for a description
en.waiting_for_winelist: We are waiting for a wine list
en.no_reviews: We did not find any wine reviews from you...
en.update_text: There are updates available for the fairTasting app, which required a restart.
en.password_minimum_length: Your password should be minimum eight characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
en.what_is_text: Do you miss the full overview of winetastings and the restaurants that have the best winelists? Would you like to be able to buy your tickets and wine in the same app? Then fairTasting is for you. With fairtasting you will get the full overview of what is moving in the world of wine. Buy tickets to tastings, download tasting guides directly in the app and plan your next restaurant or winebar visit, based on your wine preferences.

beta_test.email_verification_thanks: Your email has been verified - we will be in touch soon!
beta_test.thanks_text: Thank you so much for wanting to help us out. Please check your email, as we have sent you an email with a link to verify your email. We will activate beta testers according to our needs and in line with rollout to various countries, so please keep an eye on your email.
beta_test.instruction: We are currently looking for beta testers! Be the first in the know, have your say and help us build the best service for wine lovers.
beta_test.teaser: Thank you so much for your interest in fairTasting, due to overwhelming response, we've been forced to stop accepting beta-tester requests.

home.subscribe_confirmed: Thank you! You are now subscribed to the newsletter
home.tagline: fairTasting - by wine lovers for wine lovers
home.teaser: A tasteful service is coming soon
home.sub_teaser: By wine lovers for wine lovers

landing.welcome_text_1: Tasting wine can be interesting, fun, inspiring, educational - but also difficult, depending on who you are and at what level you are at. With fairTasting you get a tool that allows you to taste and experience wine in a whole new and very personal way. We give you the direct access to the world of wine from producer to your glass.
landing.for_wine_lovers_text_1: fairTasting is your portal to the world of wine. Here you can find wine bars and restaurants with wine list to suit your taste, you can also sign up for wine tastings and fairs. At the same time, you have the opportunity to keep track of what you have tasted, where and when - and what you think of the wines in the form of your taste notes!
landing.for_wine_lovers_text_2: With fairTasting you do not need pen and paper. You've everything in the app - not only today but also the next time you taste wine - whether it's next week or in several weeks. You simply one tool to keep track of all the details.
landing.for_wine_bars_text_1: With fairTasting you gain access to a world of wine lovers. We give wine lovers the possibility to find you, based on your wines.
landing.for_wine_bars_text_2: Create special experiences for your clientele such as wine tastings, wine makers dinners and wine flights.
landing.for_wine_bars_text_3: Access statistics about your guests' wine tastes, preferences and much more ...
landing.for_wine_shops_text_1: Where are your wines drunk and what do people think of them? What trends are in the market right now?
landing.for_wine_shops_text_2: With fairTasting you have access to statistics about your wines, so you can better plan your range. We also make it easy for you to find producers all over the world.
landing.for_wine_shops_text_3: We also make it possible for you to easily spread the knowledge of your wines, through tastings and various events.
landing.launching_soon_text: We want to give you the best experience of fairTasting, to get that please download our app.

complete_profile.explainer: To give you the best service possible we need just a little more information. We just really wanna get to know you!
complete_profile.name_explainer: Please let us know what we may call you, its polite, but it also saves your time when you want to buy something.
complete_profile.gender_explainer: To help us refer to you, according to your preference please tell us your gender
complete_profile.dob_explainer: We want to celebrate your birthday too, but more importantly we to verify that you are above the legal drinking age.
